answers.answer: When you went to your MD, did they do blood-work for glucose tolerance which is a test for diabetes. Some people have those symptoms of weakness, and lightheadness when their glucose levels drop due to diabetes or hypoglycemia. Suggest getting that checked just to rule that out.
